website_summaries.verdict: Delivers music and refreshment on the go, as it's a Bluetooth speaker and water bottle that can be used together or individually. Fun to take along on walks, trips to the beach, and more.
pros: State-of-the-art design – both a double-walled water bottle that retains your drink's original temperature for hours and a Bluetooth speaker
Bottle can be used for hot or cold liquids, and can be detached from the speaker
has a carrying loop and comes in 4 colors
cons: Holds less water than standard bottles
No volume control on the device, need to control it from linked device

customer_reviews.title: Great Traveling Duo
customer_reviews.text: I always forget to bring a mini speaker to the park or just out to a friend's house. This way, I get the benefit of both. The bottle itself holds about 16oz which is an average bottle amount. I'm still testing how long it will keep my drink cold/hot. Still testing the life of the battery for the speaker once charged. But overall I was impressed by the quality. You need to charge it before using and that didn't take long. It definitely feels well made for the price, considering my Swell alone was $25. To get a decent sounding speaker is great!
customer_reviews.author: Mullica Z.

customer_reviews.title: Such good quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!! Saw this bottle at UO in many different colors, went back for it and they stopped carrying it. So glad I found it here! The quality of the bottle itself is amazing! Keeps my drinks cold and last a very long time. The speaker can detach, battery last a good amount of time. I don’t know if the speaker itself is waterproof but I haven’t had any problems with it. So worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Lozano

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought thsi for my son in law for his birthday. He loves to spend Sundays in his pool with music and an adult beverage! This is absolutely wonderful AND if you don't feel like having the speaker near you, it unscrews and can sit on the waters edge. Perfect gift for the man who can afford to buy himself anything.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my daughter wanted. Great sound and it lasts a long time between charges.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Motz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Tested this product in my kitchen for 5 minutes. Never worked again. Went to the tech website and followed the trouble shooting procedures. Still doesn't work. Company will not replace the item.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette M. Poppe

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! Even my friends have gotten ahead and bought for themselves
customer_reviews.author: ajsandy

customer_reviews.title: You get what you expect
customer_reviews.text: It’s a fun goodie. And the sound is surprisingly good for that money and that idea. The bottle is a little small and doesn’t fit that much, but I still think it’s awesome 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The sounds quality is just as good as any other Bluetooth speaker and it keeps my water cold for hours
customer_reviews.author: Monique B.

customer_reviews.title: N/a
customer_reviews.text: My ice was still in my thermal until Monday. I can finally drink and listen to my music at the same time. But, I didn’t know it would take 6 hours for the battery low.
customer_reviews.author: janay perry

customer_reviews.title: My favorite water bottle
customer_reviews.text: awesome speaker! Keeps drinks cold for a long time too.
customer_reviews.author: A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Camp with it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bottle and take everywhere. Specially it is good to go with camp.
customer_reviews.author: Jeong, Changhun

customer_reviews.title: Fully charged,  speaker lasts only an hour max!!
customer_reviews.text: Fully charged, this speaker lasts an hour if that. No where near what its supposed to. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Pricey Hydration Bottle with Speakerphone to Use on a Campground or the Beach
customer_reviews.text: This sand proof and waterproof hydration bottle with Bluetooth speakerphone is of great use when you're on the beach or camping. And you can detach this waterproof speaker from the bottle and use it in your shower! The 16-ounce bottle is BPA free. As a water/drink bottle, it works well. The sound quality on the speaker is good, but it has no volume control. You can adjust the volume only from your device. As of now, it is priced at $69.95, and unless you can see yourself using this product in situations as above, I do not think it is worth that money.
customer_reviews.author: SanjeevP

customer_reviews.title: pricey, but quality product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because of the ease with which you can detach the speaker from the bottle. Simply unscrew the bottom from the speaker, unscrew the speaker, and then screw the speaker back on to the bottle. Speaker is easy to pair and sounds decent considering size. Great when you need to carry your drink and your music with you, and it works as a speaker phone as well. A bit high on the pricey side for a water bottle, but it's definitely made with quality.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ballister

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love to use this during my workouts. The bottle keeps my water cold and I love the sound quality on this speaker. This may seem like an odd combination, but it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Whitcome

customer_reviews.title: Novelty?..
customer_reviews.text: ..I guess it's kinda different but it's fun too. Works well and I have a couple iHome products that work easily and well. Have a little drink of water and keep exercising to that music!! I have a couple of drinking glasses made of double-wall steel with a straw and they work great!
customer_reviews.author: B. Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Well made and good sound quality.  A unique idea.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is just as good, if not better, than most other portable Bluetooth speakers on the current market. I like the design of this one because it's sort of camouflaged as a totally functional water bottle. You can detach them and use them independently of each other. Sound quality is decent.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

product_meta.title: Aquio IBTB2QQ Double-wall Steel Insulated Hydration Bottle with Rechargeable Bluetooth Wireless Speaker, Powered by iHome, Seafoam
product_meta.description: Color:Seafoam GreenEnliven your exercise with the Ibtb2 Bluetooth speaker and stay hydrated with the attached water bottle. A Bluetooth portable audio system is built into a fabric-wrapped, plastic wireless cabinet that screws onto the bottom of a double-wall insulated steel water bottle. Answer any incoming call with built-in speakerphone with echo-noise cancellation.
feature_bullets: Double-wall steel insulated bpa-free hydration bottle keeps liquids cool or hot for hours, holds 16.9 Fluid ounces (500 ML)
IP67 Certified waterproof and sand proof
Internal rechargeable lithium ion battery in the speaker plays for up to 8 hours on one charge (charging cable included)
Use speaker with bottle or separately
Speakerphone with digital echo canceling and Talk/end button
Included Components: Aquio Double-wall Steel Insulated Hydration Bottle with Rechargeable Bluetooth Wireless Speaker

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars66 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
